endpoints.description: To submit an analysis task for asynchronous processing

response.name: status
response.description: Defines the status of the analysis. Refer to Response Statuses table for additional information

response.name: resultId
response.description: Defines the unique identifier by which the analysis status/results can be retrieved

response.name: retrieveAt
response.description: Nullable. ISO8601 formatted date indicating a suggested time to re-attempt result retrieval if the status is WAITING

response.name: request
response.description: Defines the original request parameters made to invoke this analysis

members.name: analysis
members.description: Defines the types of analysis to be performed

members.name: startDate
members.description: ISO8601 formatted date representing the start date and time of analysis. Analysis is inclusive of this datetime

members.name: endDate
members.description: ISO8601 formatted date representing the end date and time of analysis. Analysis is exclusive of this datetime.

members.name: timezone
members.description: Valid IANA timezone identifier to specify the timezone under which startDate and endDate should be interpreted. If not specified, defaults to the timezone under which the customer's dashboard has been configured.

members.name: sources
members.description: Defines the name of the sources to be included in analysis (e.g. 'TWITTER'). At least 1 source must be specified. Custom sources are of the form 'CUSTOM:[PubType]' (e.g. 'CUSTOM:OurInternalFacebookData').

members.name: keywords
members.description: Keywords for analysis

members.name: languages
members.description: ISO 639-1 formatted language code. Defines an analysis filter for languages. If not specified, all languages will be included in analysis. Values must be valid Languages

members.name: locations
members.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 formatted country codes. Defines an analysis filter for locations. If not specified, all locations will be included in analysis.Values must be valid Locations

members.name: gender
members.description: Gender filter

members.name: requestingContractInfo
members.description: If true, contract usage information will be sent back even if the call is a success

response.name: resultsUri
response.description: Defines the URI that can be queried to retrieve the analysis status/results in the future

response.name: contractInfo
response.description: If requested, the contract info after this request has been processed.

endpoints.description: To retrieve the status of the analysis task and the results

response.description: Defines the status of the analysis. Refer to Response Statuses table for additional information

members.description: Valid IANA timezone identifier to specify the timezone under which startDate and endDate should be interpreted. If not specified, defaults to the timezone under which the customer's dashboard has been configured.

members.name: sources
members.description: Defines the name of the sources to be included in analysis (e.g. 'TWITTER'). At least 1 source must be specified. Custom sources are of the form 'CUSTOM:[PubType]' (e.g. 'CUSTOM:OurInternalFacebookData').

members.name: keywords
members.description: Keywords for analysis

members.name: languages
members.description: ISO 639-1 formatted language code. Defines an analysis filter for languages. If not specified, all languages will be included in analysis. Values must be valid Languages

members.name: locations
members.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 formatted country codes. Defines an analysis filter for locations. If not specified, all locations will be included in analysis.Values must be valid Locations

members.name: gender

members.name: requestingContractInfo
members.description: If true, contract usage information will be sent back even if the call is a success

response.name: contractInfo

endpoints.description: Generate authentication tokens for use in API requests

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the requesting user

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password of the requesting user

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If true, forces authentication token update for the requesting user

parameters.name: noExpiration
parameters.description: If true, the authentication token returned will not expire

response.name: auth
response.description: Authentication token

response.name: expires
response.description: Token expiration date (24 hours from token creation). If noExpiration = true, this field will not be returned

endpoints.description: Information about Twitter authors in a monitor

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the monitor being requested

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies inclusive start date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies exclusive end date in YYYY-MM-DD

response.name: authors
response.description: JSON array of zero or more authors objects that contain author-specific attributes

members.name: startDate
members.description: Inclusive start date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: endDate
members.description: Exclusive end date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: countsByAuthor
members.description: Maps each author to the number of posts made by that author for this date

members.name: numberOfAuthors
members.description: Number of unique authors

members.name: docsPerAuthor
members.description: Average number of tweets published for this date by authors in the monitor

members.name: totalImpressions
members.description: Total possible impressions for this date

endpoints.description: Volume information for a monitor aggregated by time of day or day of week)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the monitor being requested

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies inclusive start date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies exclusive end date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: aggregatebyday
parameters.description: If true, volume information will be aggregated by day of the week instead of time of day

parameters.name: uselocaltime
parameters.description: If true, volume aggregation will use the time local to the publishing author of a post when determining counts by day/time, instead of converting that time to the timezone of the selected monitor

response.name: volumes
response.description: JSON array of zero or more objects that contain endpoint-specific attributes

members.name: startDate
members.description: Inclusive start date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: endDate
members.description: Exclusive end date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: numberOfDocuments
members.description: Overall volume for this period

members.name: volume
members.description: A map of day or time to volume for that day or time (depends on parameters selected)

endpoints.description: Aggregate affinities for the selected monitor over a given date range

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the monitor being requested

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies inclusive start date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies exclusive end date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: daily
parameters.description: If true, results returned from this endpoint will be trended daily instead of aggregated across the selected date range.

parameters.name: documentsource
parameters.description: document source for affinities. valid params [TWITTER, TUMBLR]

response.name: startDate
response.description: Inclusive start date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

response.name: endDate
response.description: Exclusive end date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

response.name: affinityInfo
response.description: JSON array of affinity objects containing information about the top affinities for the date range selected

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier of the affinity

members.name: name
members.description: Name of the affinity

members.name: relevancyScore
members.description: Composite score that combines the size of the interest group and the degree of affinity to measure a given interests prevalence in a given monitor

members.name: percentInMonitor
members.description: Percentage of posts in the selected monitor with the given interest

members.name: percentOnTwitter
members.description: Percentage of posts on Twitter with the given interest

members.name: user
members.description: Email of the user who performed the audit event

members.name: eventDate
members.description: Date, in UTC, when this event occurred - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: resultsEnd
members.description: Exclusive end date of available monitor results - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: keywords

endpoints.description: Daily image results for a monitor

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the monitor being requested

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies inclusive start date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies exclusive end date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specifies type of image classes, valid values [object, scene, action, logo]

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: If defined, only the top number of results will be returned

response.name: results
response.description: JSON array of zero or more daily image results objects that contain endpoint-specific attributes

members.name: startDate
members.description: Inclusive start date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: endDate
members.description: Exclusive end date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: creationDate
members.description: Date, in UTC, when this result was created - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: numberOfDocuments
members.description: Total number of posts

members.name: numberOfImageDocuments
members.description: Total number of posts that contain image classes

members.name: imageClasses
members.description: JSON array containing volume per class

members.name: id
members.description: Unique id for this image class

members.name: name
members.description: Name for this image class

members.name: type
members.description: Type of this image class

members.name: volume
members.description: Number of posts for this day that contain this image class

members.name: proportion
members.description: Percentage of posts for this day that contain this image class

endpoints.description: Daily results for a monitor

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the monitor being requested

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies inclusive start date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies exclusive end date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: hideExcluded
parameters.description: If true, categories set as hidden will not be included in category proportion calculations

response.name: results
response.description: JSON array of zero or more daily results objects that contain endpoint-specific attributes

members.name: startDate
members.description: Inclusive start date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: endDate
members.description: Exclusive end date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: creationDate
members.description: Date, in UTC, when this result was created - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: numberOfDocuments
members.description: Total number of posts for all categories, including hidden categories

members.name: numberOfRelevantDocuments
members.description: Total number of posts for all non-hidden categories

members.name: categories
members.description: JSON array of result information for each category

members.name: categoryId
members.description: Unique id for this category

members.name: category
members.description: User or system-defined name for this category

members.name: groupId
members.description: Unique id for this category's group, if present

members.name: group
members.description: User or system-defined name for this category's group

members.name: groupHidden
members.description: If true, any categories in this group will not be included in overall proportion calculations

members.name: proportion
members.description: Percentage of posts for this day assigned to this category

members.name: driftScore
members.description: Drift score

members.name: volume
members.description: Number of posts for this day assigned to this category

members.name: hidden
members.description: If true, posts in this category are not included in overall proportion calculations

members.name: perMillion
members.description: Estimated volume results per million inhabitants (if population is available)

endpoints.description: Download training posts for a monitor

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the monitor being requested

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category id to target training posts from a specific category

response.name: trainingPosts
response.description: JSON array of training posts for the selected monitor or category in a monitor

members.name: categoryId
members.description: The id of the training category to which this post is assigned

members.name: categoryName
members.description: The name of the training category to which this post is assigned

members.name: categoryGroup
members.description: If this category is part of a category group, the name of the group

members.name: url
members.description: URL of the post

members.name: date
members.description: Date, in UTC, when this post was published - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: author
members.description: Author of the post, if available

members.name: contents
members.description: Contents of the post, if available

members.name: title
members.description: Title of the post, if available

members.name: type
members.description: Content type of the post, e.g. Blogs, Twitter, Forums, etc.

endpoints.description: Information about posts in a monitor

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the monitor being requested

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies inclusive start date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies exclusive end date in YYYY-MM-DD
Optional JSON payload to filter response

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Pipe-separated list of field:value pairs used to filter results by given parameters

parameters.name: extendLimit
parameters.description: If true, increases the limit of returned posts from 500 per call to 10,000 per call

parameters.name: fullContents
parameters.description: If true, the contents field will return the original, complete post contents instead of truncating around search terms

parameters.name: geotagged
parameters.description: If true, returns only geotagged documents matching and the given filter, if false or undefined any post matching the given filter

response.name: posts
response.description: JSON array of zero or more post objects that contain post-specific attributes

members.name: location
members.description: Legacy Location of the post, if available (replaced by the new geolocation fields: country, state, city

members.name: geolocation
members.description: The post geolocation information, if available

members.name: zipcode
members.description: zipcode

members.name: language
members.description: ISO 639-1 language code assigned to the post

members.name: authorPosts
members.description: Total number of posts by the author of this post as of the date in date, if available

members.name: authorsFollowing
members.description: Following count of the author of this post as of the date in date, if available

members.name: authorsFollowers
members.description: Following count of the author of this post as of the date in date, if available

members.name: authorGender
members.description: Gender of the author of this post, if available

members.name: trainingPost
members.description: If true, this post was assigned to a category by a human during training

members.name: assignedCategoryId
members.description: Unique id of the category to which the post belongs

members.name: assignedEmotionId
members.description: Unique id of the emotion category to which the post belongs

members.name: categoryScores
members.description: JSON array containing scores of this post for each of the categories in this monitor

members.name: categoryId
members.description: Unique id for this category

members.name: categoryName
members.description: Name of this category

members.name: score
members.description: Category score for this post; a higher score indicates a higher likelihood that this post belongs in this category

members.name: emotionScores
members.description: JSON array containing scores of this post for each of the emotions in this monitor

members.name: imageInfo
members.description: JSON array containing image analysis data

members.name: url
members.description: Image URL

members.name: brands
members.description: Collection of classified brands found in the image

members.name: objects
members.description: Collection of classified objects found in the image

members.name: customFields
members.description: User fields defined in custom content sources, if available

members.name: batchId
members.description: The id of the batch to which the custom content sources' post belongs, if available

members.name: url
members.description: URL of the post

members.name: date
members.description: Date, in UTC, when this post was published - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

members.name: author
members.description: Author of the post, if available

members.name: contents
members.description: Contents of the post, if available

members.name: title
members.description: Title of the post, if available

members.name: type
members.description: Content type of the post, e.g. Blogs, Twitter, Forums, etc.

response.name: totalPostsAvailable
response.description: The number of posts stored for this monitor that match the query. Dates in the date range selected that have more than 10 thousand posts will be sampled. You may perform extrapolation calculations to approximate the total number of unsampled posts using the results counts in the Monitor Results endpoint.

endpoints.description: Volume of total posts in a monitor

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the monitor being requested

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies inclusive start date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies exclusive end date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: groupBy
parameters.description: Specifies how the volume data over the date range will be grouped. Valid values: [HOURLY, DAILY, WEEKLY, MONTHLY]. Defaults to DAILY. Grouping requires a date range of at least 1 full unit; e.g., WEEKLY requires a date range of at least 1 week. Grouping only returns full units so the range may be truncated. e.g., 2017-01-15 to 2017-03-15 with MONTHLY grouping will return a date range of 2017-02-01 to 2017-03-01. A monitor must have complete results for the specified date range. If any day in the range is missing results an error will be returned.

response.name: startDate
response.description: Inclusive start date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

response.name: endDate
response.description: Exclusive end date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss

response.name: timezone
response.description: IANA timezone identifier specifying the timezone for all dates in the response

response.name: groupBy
response.description: Defines the grouping for the volume information

response.name: numberOfDocuments
response.description: Total volume for this period

response.name: volume
response.description: JSON array of 1..n volume information for grouped periods

members.name: endDate
members.description: Exclusive end date in dashboard time for this result - ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss
